headline: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings to Hold Conference Call on Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Financial Results
summary: MIAMI, Feb. 12, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Ltd. (NYSE: NCLH) (together with NCL Corporation Ltd., “Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings” or the “Company”) announced today it will report fourth quarter and full year 2025 financial results on Monday, March 2, 2026 at 6:30 a.m. Eastern Time with a conference call and webcast to discuss results at 8:00 a.m. Eastern Time. The conference call will be webcast via the Company’s Investor Relations website, https://www.nclhltd.com/i

The conference call will be webcast via the Company’s Investor Relations website, https://www.nclhltd.com/i

headline: Norwegian Cruise Line Holdings Appoints John W. Chidsey  as President and Chief Executive Officer
summary: Proven Consumer Brand Executive to Drive Next Phase of Growth and Execution John W. Chidsey NCLH Appoints John W. headline: Carnival Completes $19B Refinancing, Targets Further Leverage Decline
summary: CCL strengthens its balance sheet with a $19B refinancing, sharp debt cuts and progress toward sub-3x leverage in 2026.
